content:
I currently get errors similar to the one in screenshot when editing code inside items with derive(serde::Deserialize)
2021-12-19_17-22.png

Is it worth reporting? And if so, what information should I provide?
What are your rustc and r-a versions?

Most recent ones, I think

  • rustc 1.59.0-nightly (91a0600a5 2021-12-18)
  • rust-analyzer version: b65d9c3e6 2021-12-19 nightly
Hmm not sure what the problem could be here, have you tried cargo cleaning?
I don't see anything upstream that could've broken proc-macros for us again in rustc nightly
Actually even reloading the vscode & ra seems to have resolved the issue. Phantom bugs, my favorite :')
